name: Fortrescape
description:
Fortrescape is a top-down puzzle game where you can control two characters to find a way to escape all the rooms.

Controls:

- WASD or Arrows to move

- 1 and 2 or E to change character

- Mouse to aim

- Escape to pause, R to retry the level and M to come back to menu

- Weapon Character: Left click to shoot

- Shield Character: Space to dash

More infos: Buttons and levers open the door they're linked with, keys open the door to the next level. Close range enemies always know where you are and take two bullets to kill (or one touch with the shield), long range enemies need to see you and only take one bullet to kill.

If you have any questions feel free to ask them in the comments.
